The Quranic researcher is the messengers, and the Surah of the Arf is called the Al -Araf, and it is an angel.With the Prophet ﷺ in a laurel in my mother, when the Surah and the messengers came down to him, so that it is to recite it, and that I will give it to it from it, and if it is for it, then it is for it.The Prophet ﷺ: “Kill it” and we turned it on, so we preceded us, so it entered its burial, and the Messenger of God ﷺ said: In it a civil verse, which is, and if it is said to them, they will not kneel [the messengers: 48] and the appearance of the hadith of Ibn Mas'oud, this is the same And he corrected him and Ibn Mardwi from him, too In any hadith after it, they believe, and if they are said to them, they will not kneel.Before he enters those who are in his mercy [Al -Anim: 31] etc.This is open to the division of what indicates his investigation and his time and his time and his time is not.On all of what the Surda included before the holiday of the disbelieving, the fools and the promise of the righteous believers, so he said: “He said:“ The name of the Most Merciful.Knowing, as the descriptions are described and the enemies are published, and the divisions are separate.Hamid from Mujahid, so the messengers and the descriptions are tasks, and the appeals, divisions, and metaphors are other things.He described in the past and worsened as the wind was described as a reduction in the compliance of the matter and the rhythm of torment with the disbelief in order to save the prophets, peace be upon them and the peace of peace We spread their wings in the atmosphere when they were decorated with the revelation, so we separated between the truth and the false It is not concluded with Gabriel, peace be upon him, but he is their president and is guided to this hadith of the monitor The other is among the hands of “The messengers are a row of deletion, and the meant is and every sect is messengers, as well A follower like the wedding, which is the knowledge of the dump, such as the mare and the fabric.The likeness is exaggerated, and from this they said, they came to one.Some of them follow each other, and they have to know the hyena if they refuse to it.It is taken from the words of some that the nose in the original is what was mentioned and then many of its residency in the meaning of the follow -up became in it, in which it is a knowledge that it is a knowledge that it is a matter of it.In the sense of the knowledge that is the essence of the denial, that is, the messengers of charity and the well -known and are not concerned with that that the transmission of the torment of the infidels is that it is not for that Far for the Prophet, peace be upon them and the believers who have come to God Almighty from them.And the delaying the difference from the meeting, so it was said that the difference is taken by the difference in its will, so it is presented to the meeting, and it is said to the meeting The meeting is not needed until it is interpreted by his will because it is the same as their descent with the revelation that is the violation of the falsehood that is the passion and the one who is the one who is the we will come down, and it is not the same, and it is not the same, and it is not.The difference is the publication of the publication, as well as its will, if it is also according to the appearance, but perhaps it is said that that will is before, and it is said: The fulfillment is in that for the sake The will of the difference is the highest rank of publishing, and it was said: It is in it and after it to the extension of the notice that each of the descriptions is the one who is the one who is the one who is in the past.Calculating the waters of it to be fooling and wasting the sections of them, for if he came to it on the path of the rituals of the three, then it is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the same It is the obligatory for the recipient.The "Al
